Structs/Direction.html#/s:4LOC89Directio.name: up
Structs/Direction.html#/s:4LOC89Directio.abstract: Up (U): 0° = 360° in (p, z) plane where p is the projection in (x, y) plane.

Structs/Direction.html#/s:4LOC89Directio.name: down
Structs/Direction.html#/s:4LOC89Directio.abstract: Down (D): 180° in (p, z) plane where p is the projection in (x, y) plane.

Enums/FilterType.html#/s:4LOC810FilterTy.name: Lowpass
Enums/FilterType.html#/s:4LOC810FilterTy.abstract: A low-pass filter is a filter that passes signals with a frequency lower than a certain cutoff frequency and attenuates signals with frequencies higher than the cutoff frequency.

Enums/FilterType.html#/s:4LOC810FilterTy.abstract: A high-pass filter is a filter that passes signals with a frequency higher than a certain cutoff frequency and attenuates signals with frequencies lower than the cutoff frequency.

Enums/FilterType.html#/s:4LOC810FilterTy.abstract: No filter type just pass the data as it is.
